abilities.name: Spiral Swirl
abilities.effect: If Poliwrath is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Beatdown
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Darkness Pokémon or has Dark in its name, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Hyper Splash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.
